title: Portfolio
desc: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills. Made using TailwindCSS, DaisyUI, JQuery, Love and Coffee.

title: ACICTS Refreshed
desc: A modern refresh of the ACICTS Official website

title: EJS Template
desc: A custom template using Express.js Embedded JS, Node.js and MongoDB for web applications. With a pre-made admin panel included.

title: Cloud Storage
desc: A webapp that uses multiple google accounts to store a large amount of files. Google don't sue me...

title: ServerTool
desc: ServerTool was an advanced all-in-one Discord Bot with features such as server management, level system, activity system, ect.

title: ServerTool Music
desc: ServerTool music was a Discord Bot to play music in Discord Servers. It was a part of my ServerTool project.

title: ServerTool Web
desc: ServerTool was the website for my ServerTool Discord bot project. It was made using a template to showcase the bot's features.

title: Age In Days
desc: An webapp to calculate your age in days. Made using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for Bits22.

title: Password Generator
desc: An webapp to generate secure random passwords. Made using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for Bits22.

title: To-Do List
desc: An webapp to create tasks and store them in your localstorage. Made using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for Bits22.

title: Coin Toss
desc: An webapp to toss a coin. Made using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for Bits22.
